updates.update_content:
Hello Flynn friends, been a while! As we near the end of development, these updates get a little more difficult, so we're sorry for the delay. As always, if we're quiet, we're just working hard :) Now have some news on the release!
Beta Backers
No we haven't forgotten about you Beta backers! As a quick update on the Beta, we're going to officially be reaching the Beta stage veeery soon, so we will keep everyone updated on the delivery of the test build! For anyone worried about game spoilers, the beta test build is going to be a custom area and mostly combat focused, not a portion of the story. So the only spoilers will be how cool our boy Flynn is ;)
Release news

Hey Crimson babies, we just wanted to send out a quick on update on how progress has been during the current world situation, and give you some Flynn gameplay to look at!
We've done our best to keep development going at a steady rate, and Flynn is as healthy as ever! Each member of the team has had their own experience with quarantine, as we are based in several states in the US, as well as England and Sweden. We're lucky to work remotely, so we can continue the same way, but we're doing our best to take care of our personal mental health through this difficult time. We hope all of you are doing well through this tough time!

Hey Flynn fans, we hope you've all had a good start to 2020 so far! It has been a little while since our last update, and we do apologize for the silence. We're still working full time and putting everything we can in to the game, so rest assured our silence doesn't mean any delays are happening in development! Sometimes we just have to keep game secrets for the final release ya know, but here are a bunch of GIFs to look at as usual!
Hello Crimson children! While we are working hard on that 2020 release date, here are some juicy GIFs for you all showing off some gameplay with your favorite puppy companion, Dex!

Hey all Flynn fans, we have big news we can finally reveal today!
We're very happy to announce that we've partnered with Humble as Flynn's publisher! We've been working together for quite a while now, with them helping take a large load off of our shoulders so we can whip Flynn into shape and focus on making the best game possible for all of you!

Hello friends, your favorite horses back with another Flynn update. What better way to start than with some GIFs!
Puzzley bits
We've been having some fun with small puzzles recently, creating a nice balance between platforming/puzzles and combat. Flynn does more than just slice clublins all day!

updates.update_content:
Hello once again to all you Crimson babes, we hope you've had a great start to 2019 so far! 2018 was a pretty exciting year for us, even though we have to keep most of it a secret! campaign.story:
THE LEGEND OF KORRA: PRO-BENDING ARENA is board game set in the Avatar universe from Nickelodeon's global smash hit Avatar: The Legend of Korra. A miniatures board game designed by Sen Foong-Lim and Jessey Wright, The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena pits 2 players against each other in a sports game that features deep, strategic, head-to-head gameplay, highly detailed and dynamic miniatures, deck crafting and building, and team customization.
The game play of The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena is closely modeled after the popular Pro-bending sport featured in the first season of Avatar: The Legend of Korra. As such, the game is designed for 2 players, each controlling a team of 3 benders: earth, fire, and water.
Based on the events of Avatar: The Legend of Korra, Pro-bending Arena focuses on the championship match between the fresh-faced Future Industry Fire Ferrets and the sneaky and brutal White Falls Wolfbats.
The objective of the game is simple: be on the other team's side of the arena when the game ends and you will be victorious, or dominate the competition, pushing all their benders off the back of the arena to end the game immediately and claim the championship as yours!
  The below videos will give you an understanding of not only how The Legend of Korra Pro-bending Arena plays, but also an understanding of how to play it, plus the strategies involved.
      The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena encourages players to experiment with their team's techniques and trick load out. This deep customization rewards players with endless ways to build their teams and defeat their opponents. 
During your match, you'll be able to focus your benders' chi and purchase new technique cards from one of their three strategy decks, each one separated by bender type. Not only does this mid-game deck building give players a chance to turn the tide of the match when a powerful card comes up for purchase, but it also allows players to min-max each of their strategy decks. 
The strategy deck can be crafted before the game by players really looking to give their team an offensive edge. Being selective about what cards go into each one of your bender's strategy decks will give you the opportunity to control the plays you'll have access to as the game progresses. 
  Not only can you customize your team by crafting your strategy decks before the game, but you can really show your style via the trick cards you can load your team with.
There are two types of trick cards: incredibly powerful ones that can only be used once, or slightly less powerful but much riskier cheats that can be used multiple times but require players to roll a referee die each time they're used.
Collect 2 yellow fans on a single bender and they're out of the game, putting you at a serious disadvantage.
Tricks allow players to supercharge their attacks, escape incoming barrages of elements, or even make their benders impervious to being pushed back. Deciding which tricks to take, and whether or not they're the risky yellow-fan cheats or one-time powerful tricks really allows players to make a team their own.
During the course of this campaign, we will be unlocking 7 mystery teams as a free upgrade for your pledge. These are not stretch goals, they are guaranteed to be a part of your pledge no matter what our funding level ends up being! 
Additional teams offer you a ton of new strategies. Not only will each team come equipped with their own unique special ability and strategy decks, but they also come with 6 universal trick cards that can be used by any team in the game. Meaning that even if you've already built your favorite team,  any additional team you add to your game will expand the options you have for your perfectly-tuned machine.
Once you've learned your new teams' quirks and perks, maximized their power potential, and earned your first championship, why not switch it up and draft your dream team?
Adding teams to your core game will also allow you to participate in the Fantasy Draft variant. In this game mode, players can mix and match their favorite members from their favorite teams and experience the fantasy of combining two powerful special abilities into one devastating power play. 
When missing team members, all members still get their specific special ability, triggered by their technique cards. This can allow for unbelievable power combinations that will have Fire Ferret team members counter-bending elements alongside Wolfbats, dazing the opposition with illegal techniques.
        The White Falls Wolfbats are the reigning Pro-bending champions. Being fan favorites, any question of the legality of their techniques and the legitimacy of their champion status is often brushed off as loser jealousy. Still, something about the way they play does ring a little unfair to even the most die-hard fans.
In The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena, the White Falls Wolfbats have access to the some of the dirtiest tricks in the book. Their team special ability, Daze, allows the Wolfbats to put their opponents at a serious disadvantage with cheap-shots that cripple their next plays.
    Fresh-faced and newly-formed, the Future Industry Fire Ferrets are the surprise stars of the Pro-bending league. Hailing from Republic City, the Fire Ferrets are best known for their teamwork and mastery of the elements. Well, okay, that's the second thing they're known for; they're primarily known for being the team with Avatar Korra playing for them.
Focusing their chi on mastering the elements, the Fire Ferrets have become proficient in redirecting overly aggressive plays back against their opponents. Counter-bend takes your opponents' element tokens and adds them as part of your attack. These counter-bend techniques can change the course of the game in a single, well-planned play.
Known on the Pro Bending circuit for their teamwork, the all-female, all-amazing Rabaroos coordinate to unleash a rapid-fire flurry of elemental attacks. Ada, Ula, and Umi are guaranteed to bring you to your feet with their lightning fast bending. It’s always action-packed when the Rabaroos are in the Arena!
Rally and Blitz 
What makes the Rabaroos unique are their twin icons, Rally and Blitz. Activate Rally to gain Rally tokens which you can then spend when you activate Blitz. Blitz permits you to draw a card from the top of your Main Deck, immediately launching an additional action!
  The self-proclaimed “Bullies of Black Quarry”, the Boar-Q-Pines specialize in relentless pressure. Many a team of Pro Benders have withered under the attacks of the rough-and-tumble Boar-Q-Pines. Chang, Xin, and Shui may be a little prickly, but they should never be underestimated!  
Pressure
Pressure tokens are this team’s unique modifier, making your elemental tokens count for double when they hit. Even the weakest attack from the Boar-q-pines is a credible threat to be taken seriously!
  The nimble and evasive P’Li is one of the rare fire benders who has the ability to focus Chi into a concentrated line of concussive force. This Combustionbending is nigh impossible to block and nearly as difficult to avoid. After years of being held deep in the frozen wastes for 13 long years by the Order of the White Lotus, P’Li has escaped and is once again after her quarry - Avatar Korra! Do not stand in her way!
P’Li's unique and powerful bending type makes her such a fierce competitor that she doesn't need any teammates by her side to be a Pro-bending champion. Her combustionbending cannot be stopped, meaning that elements placed in an attempt to defend against her attacks cannot annihilate her attacks. P'Li is limited by the amount of combustion she can bend, since she is only allotted 6 combustion tokens. Players using her as a team will need to be careful about how often they deploy those tokens, as after all combustion tokens are deployed any combustion icons played are ignored. 
  The pride of the Golden Temple, Haka, Josei, and Kano come to Pro Bending with years of experience under their belts. As they’re not spring chickenpigs anymore, the Tigerdillos rely less on their athleticism and more on their wisdom as veterans of the sport. They know when it’s best to fight and when it’s best to regroup and refocus.
 Veteran
The Tigerdillos, while capable benders, may be past their prime in terms of raw athletic prowess. However, their Veteran status in Pro-bending gives their team members a sense of when to take advantage of the shift in battle gain even more of an edge over the competition.
  The Buzzardwasps have mastered the art of attacking pressure points at a distance, making precise strikes against opponents instead of using brute force. Their infamous “Sting” technique can make even the most iron willed Pro-bender lose focus. Shan, Ko, and Loong are aiming to take the championship trophy back to Bau Ling! 
The Buzzardwasps deliver precision attacks directly to identified weak points. Their famous sting has a powerful bite, distracting opponents, causing them to lose focus and opening them up to more attacks.
  Kuvira is not only a political and military genius, her Metalbending is without peer in single combat and her acrobatics allows her to dance between multiple foes. Kuvira can switch from attack to defense and back again within the same, seemingly effortless, sequence of complex moves. Underestimate the grace of “The Great Uniter” of the Earth Empire at your own peril!
Kuvira, Superior Combatant
Kuvira’s prowess at executing advanced techniques makes it impossible for a referee to judge whether she's cheating or not. As such her Prowess ability is versatile and powerful if you choose from all of the tricks available. To ensure that the game is fair, Kuvira cannot use Tricks that prevent her from being knocked back (such as Determination).
  Unalaq's infamy goes beyond his devious machinations and his skilled waterbending, his ability to siphon off his enemy's spiritual energy makes him a foe unlike any other. Pro-benders find themselves imagining what facing-off against such an unconventional bender would be like. How would Unalaq's soul siphon affect them in the arena, how wound he combine his most peculiar ability with his incredible waterbending skills?
Soul Siphon
If you have your Spiritbending token on your Villain board, you may spend it (return it to the supply). If you do, choose 1 bender in the target space of an attack. Your opponent must discard a card of that bender’s element from their hand. If they do not have a card, return your Spiritbending token to your Villain board.
      If you'd like to add the Amon expansion to your pledge please press the "Manage my Pledge" buttom at the top of the page and add $30. 
The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena Amon's Invasion expansion includes 3 game modes: 
1. Fully cooperative mode where 2 players, controlling 2 bending teams, face off against Amon and his equalists henchmen. Amon and his equalists are controlled by an A.I. dekc that indicates what they will do.
2. Avatar Korra mode, where Korra becomes a single bender team and has special cards that allow her to use all the elements that she has mastered. 
3. Amon controlled mode, in this mode Amon is playable and he uses his equalists to move around the board attacking his opposing team.
The Amon Invasion expansion includes:
1 Amon Miniature
1 Amon's Lieutenant Miniature
3 Equalist Chi-blocker Miniatures
1 Double Sided Amon team board (Cooperative A.I. side & the Solo Bender side)
1 Avatar Korra team board 
Amon A.I. Deck 
Avatar Korra Deck 
Amon Solo Bender deck
3 Avatar Korra Trick cards 
6 Trick cards usable by any team 
The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena Kickstarter campaign features NO STRETCH GOALS. That's right, no dollar amounts need to be met, no struggle to hit the next cool goal. Instead, you are GUARANTEED the following upgrade to your core game by backing the deluxe edition:
Exclusive, Limited Deluxe Edition Packaging. 
A limited edition championship promo-poster.
7 mystery expansion teams, totaling an additional 15 miniatures.
30 trick cards separated into 5 themed packs. Tricks are usable by all teams in the game.
30 punch-to-plastic upgrade components.
We will reveal a new item for your pledge almost every day during the campaign. All but one of these revealed items are guaranteed as part of your pledge. Each day we'll invite you to return to our campaign page to learn which team, trick cards, or component upgrade we've unveiled. 
The Legend of Korra: Pro-bending Arena Deluxe Edition is exclusively available through Kickstarter. Make sure you back today to guarantee your access to all the incredible rewards!  
IMPORTANT: Shipping Information & Retailer Verification
Retailer Pledge Levels
We will be verifying via our fulfillment partners that pledges for the retailer level are indeed for retailers. Please be prepared to provide a business address for delivery.
We will be charging shipping through our pledge manager after the Kickstarter campaign has successfully completed. It is our intent to charge backers shipping that is based on the cost to ship from our fulfillment partners' hubs to you. We will ship your rewards at our cost to our fulfillment partners' hubs. From there, our partners will ship the packages out to you as quickly and efficiently as possible.
Please review the shipping chart below for an estimate of what we are currently expecting shipping to cost. PLEASE NOTE: shipping costs may increase due to unforseen circumstances, or if you add on additional copies or optional buys.

Some aspects of the components may change before being delivered to backers. All components are pending licensor approval.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
IDW Games has Kickstarted and fulfilled 3 campaigns and is about to fulfill their 4th campaign, Rayguns and Rocketships. That campaign is scheduled to deliver 1 month early. We've also been publishing games into retail via standard distribution channels for over 4 years. 

All of our games are manufactured in China, and as such there are a few issues that could potentially slow the delivery of our campaign. The most common issues are production delays due to plastic quality, shipping delays due to vessel schedules and weather, and customs clearance when the goods come into America. 

While we have never had any of the above-mentioned delays vastly affect our delivery of a final product, there is always the potential that one of these things could cause a delay in the delivery of pledges of this campaign to backers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hi, my name is Tom Lintern and this campaign is for my graphic novel Girrion. This campaign is specifically for the funding the creation Issues 8 and 9, which will complete Volume1. That means MOST of the book is already complete. I only have about 50 pages to go out of the 225+ pages in the series.
New to the story? Not to worry!  All of Volume 1 is available in this campaign. Also Issues 8 and 9 will be of course available as well for those who have already been following along.
Thanks to the lovely and amazing Kickstarter community I've had Issues 2 - 7 funded on previous campaigns. This project began years ago and has slowly turned into something I am really devoted to and would love to work on for years to come.
GIRRION is a sweeping sci-fi fantasy story of a hero's journey in a distant world in a distant time. The saga is told through the eyes of Jarra, a poor factory worker who dreams of escaping his world of endless toil. His wish comes true, though not in a way he would have ever wanted, when his city is attacked by a dark entity called the Halodron. He escapes the conflict, but only to be thrust into a war of other-worldy magic and weaponry.
Amidst the destruction, history begins to unravel as soldiers of a forgotten war resurface and the secrets of a mysterious technology known as Girrion come to light as its scattered remains suddenly start to “reawaken”. With little time and resources, the hero must help save his crumbling empire from its destructive past.
        Inking in progress
        Volume 1 cover art in progress
     Girrion started off as a hobby over 15 years ago. Initially it was more of an illustration portfolio than a story. I wanted to be a concept artist, so I would spend a lot of time designing characters, ships and environments.
I didn't consider myself a writer back then, but I started getting ideas for a story. When I would draw environments or characters the ideas would just pop in my head. One scene led to another, then another etc. It took a lot of time, but the experience put in over the years not only helped the art, it also gave me time to develop the story more and give it more depth than it had in the earlier drafts.
Age Range: (PG - PG-13 )
- No sex or bad language
- No excessive gore. Girrion is primarily about a war so there is cartoon violence similar to the level of Star Wars, but more of it.
            This will be the first campaign where a full volume book is available. It will be 225+ pages in length. 6.14" x 9.2"
Volume 1 mockup. Cover art and design are in progress.
 Previous campaigns single issues were available in hardcover or softcover, and these formats will be available in this campaign as well. 
Sample Hardcover (Issue #7)
 Hardcover comic issues are 6" x 9". Grey cloth with a dust jacket. Each issue is anywhere from 22 - 26 pages in length.
Softcover samples (Issues 1-9)
Softcover comic issues are 6"x9" and have a glossy cover with a stock thicker than standard comics. The interior art is full color and has a watercolor feel.
Sample Character Sketch
  Sample 4" x 6" print
  How Do Add Ons Work?
Here's what you do:
Click "Manage Your Pledge" in the upper right corner (blue button) Add the total of your Add On to your pledge amount. (i.e. one Giclee Fine art print is $25.) You don't need to change the tier you've selected You are done! Later you'll get a backer survey asking how you spent your add-on dollars and for other pertinent info. Thank you!
  Generally, about half of my expenses come from printing the books and mailing them. The other half of the budget is going into the production. Most of what this campaign money goes towards is large chunks of time for me to focus fully on the book. One issue takes me 300 - 400 hours. If I'm able to knock off some days working freelance on other jobs, the books come out much faster.
  Scout Comics is now publishing Girrion! They released Issue 1 last October and will be releasing books up through this Fall. They are an indie publisher– very supportive of their creators and just a great group of people all around. They also have a wide range of comics which you can check out on their site. www.scoutcomics.com
Follow
Website: www.girrion.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/Girrion1
Instagram: www.instagram.com/girrion1/
Facebook: www.facebook.com/girrion1/
Music from Kickstarter Video: "Night Owl" by Broke For Free
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Being that this is not the first comic I've made there aren't too many major challenges with getting the book made, but there are some small ones:

Some of the artwork on certain pages goes fast, some takes very long. There are some complex scenes in this issue with lots of characters and elements that need strong design. Again from past experience, the artwork can sometimes take a bit longer than expected. Also, keep in mind I have to mix this work in with the day job.

I've learned a lot from previous Kickstarter campaigns, and I am getting more and more efficient. I'm also trying to find ways to make rewards as cost-effective as possible too. One way of doing this is to do more than one issue per campaign, which cuts down on mailing costs. Before it took so long to complete just one issue and I could only offer one per campaign, but now I plan on doing 2 -3 issues per campaign from now on.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Pocket Ops is a 2-player game of deduction and area control. As Spymasters, position your Spies and Specialists to outmaneuver your opponent and dominate the battlefield.
Players must stay one step ahead of their opponent on a battleground that is as much in the minds of the Spymasters as on the board. Predict your opponent’s moves to prevent them from gaining ground, and when all hope seems lost, snatch victory away from your opponent with clever use of your Specialist agents.
If you are the first to capture both parts of the Doomsday Device, it’s game over for your opponent.
A quick review of the game board and object will reveal that Pocket Ops is based on the familiar framework of tic-tac-toe — but don't write it off as child's play just yet! The prediction mechanic and Specialist abilities have been proven to offer playtesters both challenge and laughter. Don't believe it? Check out the sample Print n' Play files below:
   ...or check out the Tabletop Simulator mod on Steam!
  Pocket Ops is the first published design of Brandon Beran, with art and graphic design by industry veteran Josh Cappel.
         Pocket Ops is quick to pick up, because you already know how to play; If you've played Tic-Tac-Toe before, you have the fundamentals: place markers in a grid, trying to get three in a row. But wait! The simple but game-changing twist with Pocket Ops is that before you make a move, the other player gets to secretly predict where you are going to go. After your move, if they were right, your move is canceled. In addition, a variety of Specialist tokens that introduce all sorts of sneaky abilities will change the way you place and predict. Pocket Ops takes a classic framework and breathes surprising life into it. For a more detailed look, check out this fantastic overview by Tantrum House, below:

     We are very happy to bring this project to you via Kickstarter. Keeping true to our philosophy, we have asked for an amount that will get us halfway to what we need to produce the game. It will take about twice as much money as we are asking to bring Pocket Ops to life, and our part is ready. You showed amazing support for the Guild with Unreal Estate, and we know we can count on your for this current project.

Marc Specter, GuildMaster
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any project that involves the production and manufacture of a good to be delivered, there is certainly a real chance for hiccups and delays. Many board game projects on Kickstarter have been seriously hampered by art production delays, problems with an overseas factory, missing units and one shipping snafu after another.

We won't lie - stuff happens. Delays can occur. Sometimes you have to go back and forth on color samples six times just to get the color right, and even then the color isn't perfect. But what we do promise is that we will hold ourselves to the same high standards and transparency we expect from other board game publishers and our previous projects, and we will be completely honest and open with each of you every step of the way.

Aside from artwork changes that may come about as a result of stretch goals, this game is finished and ready to go to Bang Wee, the experienced manufacturer of our two previous titles.

We learned a lot from our first Kickstarter campaign, and we feel confident that those lessons will help us make this campaign successful.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Good afternoon, Agents! It's been a while. I hope this update finds you safe and healthy in these challenging times.
As fans of small portable games, I wanted to let you know about our latest project. Grand Gamers Guild is proud to announce our 18-card escape room game: The Kringle Caper!
Endangered needs your support!
Good morning Agents! It's been a while, but today I'm going to ask you to look at a new mission profile: Project Shikoku!

Good morning Agents. It's been a while.
I wanted to reach out and let you know that we just launched our next game on Kickstarter: The Artemis Project.

To you that have supported us previously, we go live at 9 tomorrow morning. Feel free to check out the video and the campaign. We hope to see you there: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/burntislandgames/1508813296?ref=433593&token=de981c5c

Today ends the voting for the BGG Most Anticipated Games of 2018 nominations. If you’ve not already given a thumb to our next project Endeavor, please do: https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/231943/item/5764955#item5764955
If you want to find out more about the progress of the project, visit endeavorgame.com. Thanks!

Hey everyone! Fulfillment began earlier this week, and we're getting comments that Pocket Ops is showing up on your doorsteps. Very exciting! Hopefully you can get your first games in this weekend. Be sure to take pictures for us to post on our Facebook page as well as BoardGameGeek.
And speaking of BGG... Can I ask a favor? Would you go and rate Pocket Ops for us? The more ratings we get, the higher we'll climb. The higher we climb, the more copies we'll sell. And the more we sell, the greater the chance for a reprint and additional content.

Good morning Agents! You might be saying, "That is a very strange name for a Backer update." Well, that is the number of miles I traveled yesterday over 13 hours to take care of Pocket Ops fulfillment for you. If you follow us on Facebook, you might have caught the 3 short videos I posted yesterday in my travels.
This was one of those situations where you wait, and wait, and wait, and then everything happens all at once. Our lovely little game was making its way cross country, when I got the call Monday morning that the games were in fact in Ft. Wayne IN and would be delivered to Impressions the next day (Tue Nov 28). The calendar showed that I did not have any commitments, and so shortly after 8a the next day I got in the car and drove to Ft. Wayne.

Good morning Agents! Good news abounds!
We recently got the notification from the logistics company that Pocket Ops is on our shores. As of the original note 3 days ago, it was waiting for customs clearance and off-loading. Once that is complete, it will be separated from the rest of the container in which it traveled and then begin the journey to Impressions in Ft. Wayne, Indiana.
Since it will only be 2-3 more weeks before we'll have the product on hand to start stuffing into packages, we are ready to begin some of the staging work for the fulfillment process. As such, we will be locking down addresses and charging credit cards (for add-ons) on Mon Nov 13. Be on the lookout for your 48-hour address finalization notice that comes from BackerKit.

In the Pocket
Pocket Ops has been an amazing success at Essen! It’s very easy to underestimate a game as simple as this one… even being the publisher, I still do it myself! But then I play the game, and BAM, I realize why I signed it. We’ve gotten so many great reactions when people have that “Oh my gosh!” moment.

campaign.story:
Join the Cognitive Drawing Mailing List Here:
Cognitive Drawing Mailing List Signup!
I believe EVERYONE can teach themselves how to draw!
You don't need an expensive education or thousands of hours of practice to start seeing results either. All you need is to learn this simple method of Cognitive Drawing and you will soon be decoding and memorizing how to draw things like you never imagined possible. 
How can I make such a bold claim? Because this technique is exactly how I taught myself how to draw.
I believe that with Cognitive Drawing you will quickly learn how to test yourself and force your brain to start memorizing what you are learning. 
What is Cognitive Drawing?
Cognitive Drawing will be an easy (90+ page) workbook designed to teach you how to learn to draw anatomy from memory. Not only will you learn to draw but you will learn to do it in a way that helps your brain retain what you learned. 
This book is perfect for beginners and intermediate artists of all ages.
The technique in this book is exactly how I (Jason Brubaker) taught myself to draw as a teenager without an expensive art education. At the age of twenty I was hired by a storyboarding agency in Los Angeles and I have been a professional artist ever since working in storyboards, animation and visual development on some of the biggest movies and commercials in Hollywood. (You can see my IMDB credits here.)
We are printing the book on sketch book paper perfect for drawing with pencil.
How did Cognitive Drawing start?
Back in the mid 90's when I was trying to learn to draw, I developed this method while trying to memorize anatomy and different artistic styles. Although I didn't have a name for it yet, it was the way that I was able to learn anatomy quickly. It was't long before I was able to draw anatomy and styles quickly from memory and I attribute much of this success to this method.
Over the years I have tried to explain the Cognitive Drawing method to friends assuming that others were doing it as well. To my surprise, I have never found anyone teaching or using this technique. Twenty years later I decided to make an experimental worksheet to show a drawing class how to quickly learn to draw things on their own. To my surprise, about 90% of the students found my method surprisingly easy and highly effective for learning to draw from memory. 
Since it worked so well for others I decided that it was time to try to make a Cognitive Drawing book using this technique to aid in learning one of the hardest things to learn to draw: anatomy. I announced the idea on my Youtube channel and nearly 100 people signed up to be beta testers for an experimental 40 page anatomy book using Cognitive Drawing. 
After a few months of testing Cognitive Drawing the beta testers were finished and sent me their results and I was once again blown away with the high percentage of positive feedback and massive improvement for almost all of the beta testers.
The beta-test worked better than I expected again but it still needed much improvement to be a real workbook. I received much needed feedback from the testers and studied all the problem areas in their drawings I was able to refine Cognitive Drawing into an amazing and fun daily exercise designed to walk a beginner artist through the entire male figure (from any angle or pose) within a month.
What is in the Cognitive Drawing Book?
Cognitive Drawing will be a 96+ page workbook book designed to fold flat so you can draw on all the pages. 
(The page count will keep growing as we hit stretch goals. I would like to get it up to 140 pages if possible.)
About 60% of the workbook will be cognitive drawing worksheets and the rest of the book is full of lessons and exercises to help you tie it all together. This book will help you memorize proportions of body and face, muscle groups, poses and more and will show you how to use Cognitive Drawing to learn how to memorize any drawing style you find. 
Along with Cognitive Exercises the book is filled with muscle breakdowns and other exercises that helped me understand how to build a figure from scratch. Here are some samples of some of the daily exercises:
The book will be a combination of Cognitive Drawing exercises mixed with anatomy breakdowns and other drawing lessons.
Once you complete the book, not only will you know anatomy but you will also be able to use this technique with all kinds of other reference material like: anatomy books, comic books, robots, dinosaurs, aliens, monsters, machines, manga, your favorite artists or even photos. The sky is the limit!
Who Is Cognitive Drawing For?
The book is designed for Homeschoolers, Drawing Groups, Classrooms and personal use. There is no nudity in the book so it's safe for all ages.
I have seen much improvement in students ages of 8 and up. As long as there is a desire to learn to draw and you can spend about 30 minutes a day focused on doing an exercise then this is for you.
Backed by Science?
Interestingly enough, some of my findings agree with what scientists have learned about how the brain learns and retains information. This is the field of Cognitive Psychology. I have even interviewed a Cognitive Scientist who experimented with my method and he has helped me develop it to be even better than I expected.
I will post an interview with him here where he breaks down the scientific principles used in Cognitive Drawing and why they work.
Production Timeframe
There are about 3 months of production left on the book depending on how many extra pages we can get funding to add. I would like to be able to make the book 140 pages but this would mean hitting stretch goals. So depending on how many pages the final book is will determine how quickly it goes to print.
Once printing begins it will take about 3 months to have the books in my studio and they will be shipped out shortly after that.
I am setting the delivery deadline to April 2018 as a worst case scenario. But the funding amount will determine the exact timeframe and we might be able to have the books in your hands by this Christmas. 
Money
I am planning to print 3000 copies of this book quoted at $10,410. With shipping estimates as well as Kickstarter fees and Card processing fees, it will be over $16,000. We need another 9k for the remaining production costs and assistance to complete all the pages and worksheets. This brings our total to $24,900 to make sure this book can get off the ground.
If we don't reach this goal then I will not be able to invest the time or money to get the book printed so please help by sharing this with everyone you know who wants to learn how to draw.
Who Am I?
I'm Jason Brubaker. I am a self taught artist. I started my professional career at the age of 19 and have worked for more than 20 years in the entertainment industry on big movies (Blade, Pitch Black, Kung Fu Panda 1, 2 & 3) and hundreds of commercials before launching my own company to publish graphic novels and books. Now I self-publish graphic novels for a living. You can see my books here: http://CoffeeTableComics.com
I've spoken at grade schools, high schools, colleges, libraries and comic conventions about making comics and doing art for a living. For speaking enquiries about Cognitive Drawing please contact CoffeeTableComics@gmail.com.

campaign.story:
We are Justin Lucas and Mitchell Lucas, satirical writers behind the Science Fiction parody series The Rockman Chronicles and the parody twitter account @AwfulFantasy—where we post fake excerpts from non-existent Fantasy and Scifi books, with a satirical spin.
We’ve had a lot of fun creating some really awful tweets in our first year on Twitter, and we’ve always been kinda bummed that some of these stories had to end at 140 characters. So we have decided to expand some of our favorite tweets into a collection of short stories! We also like variety, so we'll throw in some honorable mention tweets and some activities and puzzles and stuff.
The first part of the book is a collection of short stories based on a few of our more popular tweets. Each story begins with a beautifully illustrated drawing by the extremely talented Jesse Lucas and ranges from 10-20 pages. They are all chock-full of ridiculously awful prose, bad analogies, horrible opinions, uneducated explanations, and dumb jokes. Following each short story, there will be ridiculous activities based on the preceding tale like word searches, mazes, mad libs, horrible cooking recipes, and more!
Here are some of the short stories:
Cthulu's a Dick
Based on: "Al gazed upon Cthulhu and was consumed with madness. Not the crazy kind, the angry kind. Cthulhu totally pissed him off. Cthulhu's a dick."
Methane in the Membrane
Based on: "Lia stepped off her ship onto the planet. 'That smells gross, Ben.' Ben was confused until they both died. The atmosphere was methane."
Hard-boiled Hobbit
Based on:“Of all the hobbit-holes in The Shire, this dame had to walk into mine. Tall as she was beautiful. 2'3" and feet as hairy as my last case."
The Confusing, But Not Impossible Labyrinth
Based on:"'I smash you to nothing!' said the ogre. 'That's physically impossible,' said Dean. The others agreed, and the ogre admitted he was wrong."
And more!
And in each physical copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy there will be a very special roleplaying adventure for the 5th edition of a popular RPG with a name I can't remember: The Daemon Queen’s Saecret Tower!
The best answer is illustrations. It's a scientific fact that 100% of all things can be made 403 times better with some great art, and we believe that our book could benefit from that math.

We have the gift for deep storytelling, and complex, sophisticated writing, but we don’t draw no good. So, it is our responsibility to see that someone else who is good at art does that stuff and gets paid while we stick to what we're good at: writing badly.

We've recruited the incredible talents of Jesse Lucas to do our illustrations, and it's not just because he shares the same last name as us. We believe his beautiful and clean art style would compliment our project perfectly and are excited to see what more he can do once this book gets funded.

Check out one of the images right now:
"The Dwarves sat down for a game of Offices & Executives. Thimlo, playing as Ted the Lawyer, rolled a 9 to dial out with his +1 desk phone."

In addition to having a Kickstarter for the art, we also need help getting the full-color, physical book printed. We think that having a physical book to hold, open, and touch would be pretty great, and we know that everyone loves to hold, open, and touch things. This book allows you to do all three at once. I can only think of 5 other things in the ENTIRE WORLD with this kind of capability.
At $15 or more, you will receive a digital copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy!
A Digital copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy!
At $20 or more, you will receive a digital bundle of EPIC proportions!
A Digital copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy!
Digital Copy of John Rockman and the Trials of Galactar! Book 1 in The Rockman Chronicles!
Digital Copy of John Rockman and the Cosmic Brain of Corruption! Book 2 in The Rockman Chronicles!
A pdf of The Dæmon Queen's Sæcret Tower! An @AwfulFantasy Roleplaying Adventure!
At $30 or more, you will receive the physical copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy with digital bundle!
A full color, beautifully illustrated copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy with The Dæmon Queen's Sæcret Tower included in the book, signed by the authors!
A Digital copy of Harris Dies on Page 32 and Other Tales of Awful Fantasy!
Digital Copy of John Rockman and the Trials of Galactar! Book 1 in The Rockman Chronicles!
Digital Copy of John Rockman and the Cosmic Brain of Corruption! Book 2 in The Rockman Chronicles!
A pdf of The Dæmon Queen's Sæcret Tower! An @AwfulFantasy Roleplaying Adventure!
The Dæmon Queen's Sæcret Tower is a very special roleplaying adventure specifically designed to be compatible with the 5th edition of a very popular RPG that I can't seem to remember the name of. It's that one game where you sit around with your friends and you act like you are different people in a fantasy world and you roll dice. There's a person at the table who leads the adventure. Man, why can't I remember what it's called? Oh well, I think you know the game I mean.

In The Dæmon Queen's Sæcret Tower, you and some friends will partake in the most ridiculous adventure ever created. Here's the story:

Once a regal and respected Queen of the Land of Orboz, Queen Fœtida instilled the opposite of fear into the hearts or her loyal subjects. Faced with the knowledge that she comes from a royal line rife with incest and illegal underground dragon fighting, Fœtida was dethroned by the Lord of a lesser house who uncovered her family’s darker past. Queen Fœtida, residing in an old, long abandoned sæcret tower in the Dargon Mountains, is now a servant of Necrosa, and has turned from her love of Contemporary Impressionism to the somewhat Darker Arts—NECROMANCY!
The Undead are invading the peaceful townships and cities of Orboz, consuming the flesh of the living, and ever spreading their vile dark magic and unpopular religious beliefs. Queen Fœtida has been spotted as a shade near the Dargon Mountains, and tale is told she still lives, most likely raising the dead as her own Personal Undead Army of Revenge!
It is up to a small band of heroes (you) to find Queen Fœtida and put an end to her Necromaniacal ways. In the Dargon Mountains lies the decrepit heart of the dark magic that plagues Orboz like a plague. In this metaphorical heart is where you must end the Dark Queen’s evil, vengeful plans (by killing her). Deep up inside The Dæmon Queen’s Sæcret Tower!

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The biggest risk with projects similar to ours is oversight in printing and shipping costs for physical book rewards to backers. Some project creators have found themselves owing way more in shipping and printing costs than they thought, leaving them unable to send backers their due rewards. 

We have mapped out all possible costs and planned for the “worst case scenario,” in which we are funded solely by the backer tier with the lowest overhead. We have made sure that each tier in itself is profitable so each donation has some left over that can ultimately go to art, with no fear of neglecting to fulfill backer rewards.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello supporters,

What a great month! We've seen some great support from backers and people sharing our Kickstarter! It was amazing to see the amount of interest in our project.

Unfortunately, we didn't quite hit our goal. We really liked the idea for this book, and will continue to look at ways we can expand Awful Fantasy from its Twitter roots.

Keep an eye on @AwfulFantasy on Twitter for more awful, awful fantasy and sci-fi writing, and hopefully some more exciting news in the future!

Thanks again.

- Justin and Mitchell

We've passed the $4,000 mark and we're on our way to hit $4,500! We are incredibly thankful for everyone who has supported us and shared us. While we may not fund, we aren't giving up until the Kickstarter is over. Happily, we've been gaining quite a few pledges in the final hours and there is still 21 hours left. Anything can happen!

Help us out if you haven't and share! Tell your friends. Tell your dog. Tell your dog's friends. Tell strangers. Tell stranger's dogs. And, even tell stranger's dog's friends.

Thanks for your support and we'll see what happens in the next 21 hours!

Grab ye tankards and gather 'round ye old hearth, lending me thine ears. Lend me your hairy ears, your pointed ears, your normal human ears, and your pointed and green gobliny ears, for I have a lengthy, epic story to tell.

We've reached $3,000 in funding! Thank you!

At 6 days left in our campaign, we are humbled by the response we've received, but we know it's an uphill battle to reach our funding goal. That doesn't mean it can't happen!

We want to thank the gracious people who have backed our project so far, and ask those who can't financially support our project (or even those who already have) to help spread the word in any way you can!

Thanks again, and stay tuned for more updates!

-Mitchell

Hello everyone!

We don't really have much to report other than we have reached the $2,000 mark! We are getting up there, slowly but surely. We still have a bit to go so hopefully we get some more interest in the coming days and weeks.

In other news, I figured maybe I could show you a little something from the book that I've been working on.

Good afternoon ye olde and ye younge backers.

I just wanted to do a quick first update to thank you all for backing our project! Your support means a lot to us, seriously. We are incredibly happy to have you all with us on our Awful adventure.

Secondly, we just received word that we are now a Kickstarter Staff Pick! I guess someone at Kickstarter thinks we've got something special here...or they just had some Staff Pick quota to meet and they randomly picked ours so they could go home for the day. Either way, it's been done and there's no going back! We're a Staff Pick forever!

The first week is going well and we're getting closer and closer to that $1,000 mark. Be sure to share our project with your friends and family if you can! We know that there are lots who don't know about Awful Fantasy or our project, and we hope to change that soon!

Thanks again for your support! This is going to be fun!

campaign.story:
Myth is a cooperative game for 2 to 5 players developed and published by MegaCon Games. Blackwall Warrens and the Shores of Kanis expand and update the world of Myth with Journeyman Heroes, terrifying new monsters, exciting new weapons and armor sets, and a revised rule set and cards. 
Here's a look at everything you've unlocked so far!
                            Click the link below to learn how to play Myth.
The kingdom of the Okian lies at the heart of sun-scorched Kanis. It is a sand-blasted land where massive stone monuments rise to honor the dark master Anunkara, Keeper of the Dead.
Under the sprawling ruins of the once great trading city of Blackwall lies the Knot. The maze of tunnels house uncounted evils. In the deep dark of the warrens courage is tested and fear takes hold.
What is NEW!
There is a lot of new. 
5 "light" Journeyman Hero decks (Shores of Kanis)
5 "dark" Journeyman Hero decks (Blackwall Warrens)
New Heroes: Swashbuckler and the Outsider
Commander class monsters
New Bosses, Mini-bosses, Captains, and Minions
Orange tier weapons and gear
Gold tier armor sets
Dual wielding
Malice pool
Myth Module System
New realm tiles
New traps
New titles
Capture and Interrogate rules
Bar Fight alternate game mode
What is UPDATED.
2nd Edition rules  
All base game Hero cards
All KS exclusive Hero and item cards (Trickster, Skald, Spriggan) 
All base game item cards 
Trap deck
Over the last year, we've been able to focus on the Myth base game. We've updated the rules, which you can download below. They are more streamlined and function like more traditional board game rule books. 
The entire run of Hero and item cards has been revised for clarity and amended using keywords. These have been released for some time through the Myth patch system on our website and have already been played with and tested by hundreds of players.
The trap system has been completely overhauled. Traps are more straightforward and deck based, with setup images and explanation on each card. Furthermore, any trap can be used on any realm tile. 
Finally, we've made a clear distinction between story quests—now expanded and renamed in the form of Myth modules—and the much more robust, free-form questing, referred to as Adventuring.
Myth Modules vs. Adventuring
The Myth quest system has been re-imagined. The overlapping story and free-form questing nature of the base game has been overhauled. We’ve separated them completely into two modes: Modules and Adventuring.
Modules are greatly expanded, lore-filled story quests. Everything for setup has been provided and explained. Players in modules ignore realm tile legends. Setup is as easy as placing the minis and objects where the images indicate.
Furthermore, modules have a larger story and expand the lore of Myth. They place you in the world and immerse you with the history and richness of the events taking place. Narrated sections of the module are read by a participant, yet the game remains fully cooperative.
Free-form questing is now referred to as adventuring. While adventuring, players utilize the legends on the realm tiles and populate their quest per the quest cards. However, the adventuring system provides room for the discovery of Bosses and the earning of titles.
The new monster classification, Commanders, are key here. Commanders make those monsters under them exceedingly more difficult. Commanders can also be captured and interrogated by the Heroes to find a Boss’ lair. Most importantly, these two modes of play are now completely separate. There is no crossover. Myth is either played by using a module or by adventuring—never both.
Heroes
The two new Heroes that come in the expansions are the Swashbuckler (Shores of Kanis) and the Outsider (Blackwall Warrens). Like the other Myth Heroes, they have unique play styles and offer their own set of challenges. Each new expansion Hero also has their journeyman deck upgrades included in their box.
The Swashbuckler is a pure dual wielder and only follows the light path. He consistently has the capacity to activate his secondary weapon and the extra Fate Dice to trigger that weapon's power. Additionally, he is much more at home in danger, surrounded by a host of monsters or facing off one-on-one with a boss. He is an absolute blast to play. 
The Outsider utilizes the Malice system and only follows the dark path. When Heroes take advantage of the Darkness and strike out of revenge, Malice is generated. This Malice finds its way into a pool that only certain Heroes can access. The Outsider may choose to make a played card more powerful by utilizing Malice to supplement it as defined by the card. Additionally, the Outsider is very good at manipulating the Darkness meter to his own nefarious purposes.   
Beyond the new Heroes, each expansion provides players with the means to upgrade their existing Heroes from Novice to Journeyman. Journeyman Heroes have made a choice: to follow the light or listen to the whispers of the Darkness. 
The light Journeyman Heroes are found in the Shores of Kanis. The dark Journeyman Heroes are found in Blackwall Warrens. 
Look for updates that detail the Journeyman Heroes.
Shipping information - Please take note  
Based on our experience with Myth, we will be charging shipping after the Kickstarter ends. This cost will be based on the actual costs incurred to ship. We will collect this via our pledge manager after the campaign concludes.  
This charge will be calculated by our shipping partner with maximum discounts applied. 
Simply put, shipping costs change considerably in the months between a KS end and the actual shipping date. Estimating future costs in the present is impossible, and not being flexible enough to recoup skyrocketing shipping costs is not economically feasible for us anymore.
Additionally, MegaCon Games will be responsible for shipping a backer's reward ONCE to the address on file. If the backer has not taken the responsibility to update his or her address, or does not claim the package in the time provided, then reshipping the item will be done so at additional expense to the backer.

Risks and challenges
Through Myth and MERCS we have produced miniatures, dice, books, cards, maps, and counters. From past experience, the more successful the KS the longer the delays, but we have always delivered. We understand that with anything produced overseas delays can happen, especially with shipping and customs. 

We've done our best to minimize unknown risks as much as a company can. We will communicate all the pieces and parts through KS updates. Through the entire process of the KS (pledges, production, and fulfillment) we communicate.

Mounted upon the mightiest of Stallions the HelsVakt Champion is an incomparable and implacable foe with no mercy or relent in any fiber of it's being. These are the nigh immortal leaders of Hel's Armies who bind these hordes of murderous maniacs by force of will and an iron fist. STRETCH GOAL #4 $ 27,000.00 CRAVEN B!!!!

Equipped with short bows and wicked daggers and javelins the Craven are the silent hand of death that creeps along the fringes of the battle field striking at the weakest points of the enemy, or the ranging vanguard of the murderous host that visits sudden, silent bloody death to hapless villages unfortunate enough to be in the path of Hel's madness. The Chosen Command figures are a Leader, a Hornblaster and a standard bearer To cover this set simply manage your pledge upward by $8.00 per leader or hornblaster and $12 per standard bearer figure desired. The Leader and Hornblaster will be cast as a single piece while the standardbearer will be cast in multiple pieces as per the needs of production and all three will be cast in high quality white metal and supplied with a single 25 mm round plastic base.

To cover this option as a reward selection simply manage your pledge upward by $20.00 per Helsrider desired.
 THEMED SET DEFINITION..................
The currently unlocked themed sets availabel as reward selections are:
 The Chosen, 5 armoured make warriors pictured together above.

 These sets will not expand to include new as yet unlocked figures.

 as new themed sets are unlocked you will find them posted here.
 ADD-ONs...........................................
   Backers may add additional themed sets and solos to their existing pledges by managing their pledge value upward to include the value of the themed set desired. The values per themed set are as follows;

   Chosen...............$35.00 per set
   Helsmaidens.......$35.00 per set
   Berserkers............$35.00 per set
   Craven.................$35.00 per set
   Chosen solo..........$8.00 per figure
   Helsmaiden Solo........$8.00 per figure
   Hordesman Hero Solo........$8.00 per figure
  Hordesman Captain Solo.............$8.00 per figure
   Jotunn Solo...............$18.00 per figure ( please note that the Jotunn CAN be pledged for without having to also pledge for another figure. Just add $10.00 to the Solo pledge level that corresponds to your shipping zone to cover the full cost of the Jotunn as a Solo selection. )
    Helsrider Champion Male or female.............$20.00 per figure ( please note that the Helsriders CAN be pledged for without having to pledge for another figure. Simply add $12.00 to the Solo pledge level that corresponds to your shipping zone to cover the full cost of the Helsriders as a solo selection.)
MATERIALS.....................................
Each of these figures are cast in high quality, lead free, white metal and is supplied with a 25 mm round plastic base. The figures may or may not be cast in a single piece as determined to be most efficient for moldmaking and casting purposes. I do try to keep my figures single piece as often as possible and whenever necessary I do try to be sure that my multi-part figures are easily assembled.

SCALE............................................

The figures are built in a true 32 mm scale which means that the armature for an average sized human male would stand 32 mm tall from the bottom of the feet to the top of the head with both feet together and back straight. This typically puts the eye level of the unposed human male figure at 28 mm high. The pose can drastically effect the final height of the figure as the lengths of the bones and flex points of the miniature do not change during the posing process.

PROPORTIONS........................................
The proportions of my figure tend to be much more idealized than what you might typically find in other miniature ranges which means that the heads and hands are more appropriately sized to real life proportions. Humans are typically 7 " heads " tall while dwarves are more typically 4 to 5 heads tall, and elves would be 6 heads tall. 
AESTHETICS.............................................

The Helsvakt like the Njorn are a special breed of human. They are superhumanly strong and tough by their exposure to the magics of the Sorceress Hel. This is reflected in their stature and physical heft / girth. They are slightly taller than normal humans ( between 35 and 38 mm tall unposed ) and thicker as well. their proportions are still measured by the same rubric but the overall effect is slightly comic book like.
 I find most of my artistic influences for the helsvakt between the likes Frank Frazetta, Paul Bonner, and Joe Madrueira. I love Frazetta's approach to pose and gesture and Paul Bonner's incredibly realistic detail and Joe Mad's overall stylization and energy. As for the design themes of the Helsvakt I look to the icons of evil barbarians in popular fiction and film from my child hood. The Jun horde from beastmaster......probably the formative image of an evil barbarian horde for me, and the riders of Doom from Conan the Barbarian. Warduke.....one of my most beloved toys as a kid........... Brom's warriors of the Dark Sun world........and probably hundreds of other images that all run to one big ball of spikey, battered metal, torn leather, tattered pelts, chains, closed helms, horns, and bone trinkets. You know the stuff of medieval nightmares. All good fun.
 GOALS...............................
My ambition for this kickstarter campaign is to fund the creation and production and distribution of the final sets needed to " finish " the HelsVakt range of miniatures within the RBG fantasy world. I have already funded through a recent KS campaign a set of semi modular rank and file troops, the Hordesmen, along with a set of murderous archer / assassins called the Craven, and a group of a few Heroes of reknown withint he HelsVakt Army, Hakar the Horrible, Bloody Garm, Valda the Black hearted, and Svartulf the Savage.

  BERSERKERS 4 new berserkers
  CRAVEN 4 new ranged helsvakt warriors

 Very ambitious I know but I am up for the challenge and ready to make my best efforts. My most recent Kickstarter funded 24 figures in 30 days and of those 24 figures I sculpted 18 of them over the course of the 30 day campaign and the original 6 I had sculpted over the course of the week prior to the launch of the campaign. I can do this. The giants and Mounted elites will probably take a while to complete but I am confident I can have all funded figures sculpted within 30 days of the close of the KS.


  
  I work with very well established and very experienced moldmaking and casting contractors. With the very diligent help of Valiant Enterprises and Omar's Workshop I was able to deliver my previous campaign promises right on time with no production failures at all. I do not foresee any problems occurring between these two services in the deliver of this campaign either.
  I go to any length necessary to see to it that the people who support me are treated with the respect and appreciation that they deserve and I always work very hard to be sure that they receive their rewards as promised within the shortest period of time possible. It is my commitment to any backer that your contribution to this or any RBG kickstarter campaign is as safe a bet as you can make. I WILL deliver as promised and I won't take a year to do it.
 ADDITIONAL POSTAGE................................................................

campaign.story:
Conan is a miniature-based board game that pits one player, the overlord, who controls hordes of savage tribesmen, no-good lowlifes and undead minions against 1 to 4 players who incarnate the legendary Conan and his fellow adventurers. The gameplay is asymetric, as the overlord possesses a large selection of models and objectives which are his own, whereas the brave heroes are played from a first person perspective, much like in a role playing game. An adventure can be played out in 1 hour on one of the beautiful game boards as you pit your wits, daring and tactical acumen against your opponent
 EXPANSIONS:
Join Conan and his companions as they cross swords with the Vanirs, pursue the Frost-Giant's daughter, do battle with a necromancer defiling the burial grounds of wars past and more in the Third expansion for Conan!
This set contains:
Niord, Aesir Hero
5 Aesir warrior allies
10 Vanir warrior Minions
Atali, the daughter of Ymir, the frost-giant, Leader
Atali's Brothers, 2 frost giant monsters
5 Monstrous Crow minions
1 double sided game board
4 scenarios written by Croc and Sippik
Token, tiles and Character sheets.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Far to the South of Conan's home there lies a dry, arid land where a rugged, dark skinned people eke as much of a life as they can out of the sands. The environment is not the only danger in these lands however, there is a darker, more sinister power at work, one that man should have known to leave well enough alone but the promise of power is too tempting for some. Now the dead rest uneasily beneath the sands and monstrous beasts devour men like cattle as the great and powerful watch on, eternally.
This set contains:
1 exclusive Assassin hero
1 Thot-Amon Leader
10 Giant scorpions monsters
1 Scorpion broodmother monster
5 Assassins minions
5 Eternal guard minions
1 double sided game board
4 scenarios by Bruno Cathala
Token, Tiles and Character Sheets
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This place is a mystery in Howard's works. It is known however that it’s home to great sorcerers whose spells are feared by those from the West. Take Conan and his companions East to this mysterious land as they are swept up in a sinister assassination plot!
This set contains:
1 exclusive Hero
5 Tower Guard minions
5 Javelin throwers minions
5 Honor Guards minions
5 Foo Dogs minions
1 Sorcerer leader
1 double-sided gameboard
1 half sized game board
4 Scenarios by Antoine Bauza and Ludovic Maublanc
Token, Tiles and Character Sheets
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 KS EXCLUSIVE ADD-ONS:
A ferocious pack of giant wolves that the Overlord can use to take down the more tencious prey, including heroes!
A feisty warrior who is in NO WAY RELATED TO ANY CHARACTER YOU MAY KNOW is a character that can be used as both a Hero and an overlord minion!
This book contains the beautiful artwork from the Conan game as well as 19 brand new scenarios that ca, be played as an 8-episode campaign including hero and overlord progression!
A feral beast from deep within the wild corners of the world, The Sabertooth-Tiger is a new monster minion that comes with his own scenario as well as guidelines for integrating him into others.
“The Strangler” as he is known is a cold blooded murderer. A new leader minion, he comes with his own scenario as well as guidelines for integrating him into others.
The Personal guard of King Conan, these fearsome warriors can be led by any hero with the command skill!
A ferocious being from another plane. The earth demon can be summoned by both hero and overlord sorcerers to give them a huge punch in combat!
GUEST BOXES: 
We asked multiple artists to draw us their favorite Conan characters and this was the result! Each box contains two alternative heroes complete with their Character sheets and equipment cards (where applicable).
 OTHER MINIATURES:
Ageera is often accompanied by his two lieutenants Afari and Shubba. This pack will let you play this dangerous Warrior/mage duo as well as their personal bodyguards!
The "Dragon" is the biggest model we've made for the game and presents a herculean challenge for any and group of adventurers!
Powerful ranged minions, the Crossbowmen will give you more variety in you games and come with their own mission as well as guidelines for using them in others.
These nefarious, inhuman beings come with their own scenarios as guidelines for using them in others.
This powerful hero from another planet represents a strong and unbowed yogah before his enslavement in “the tower of the elephant”
 3D SCENERIES:
 OTHER OPTIONAL PURCHASES:
74 Highly detailed, 32mm, plastic models
1 Book of Skelos (Plastic overlord dashboard)
25 coloured base sleeves
9 engraved, six sided dice (3 Yellow, 3 Orange, 3 Red)
60 Plastic energy gems
4 Hero character sheets
1 Turn counter sheet
43 Creature tiles
55 spell and equipment cards (1.65x2.48in / 42x63mm)
2 double sided game boards 24x28in / 60x70cm (4 maps)
Over 80 tokens (doors, chests, villagers, effects...)
1 rule book (8 scenarios)
All pledge levels will be available in English and French. You will be able to choose your version during the pledge manager phase after the campaign.
The Barbarian level pledge will get you a standard game box along with ALL the stretch goals unlocked during the campaign.
The King level pledge is a deluxe box that will only be available during the kickstarter campaign. The additional exclusive models included come with 4 scenarios to play with them. We will also include ALL the stretch goals that are unlocked during the campaign.
Please note that anything bearing the following logo is an exclusive reward for Kickstarter backers. Any remaining models will only be available at special events and conventions.
Each of the superbly detailed boards provided was designed to immerse you totally in the game. (Each board will have multiple scenarios attached to it, so that you can forge any number of  adventures!).
The Inn for example, is an iconic location for any self-respecting adventurer, the one place where all it takes is one wayward comment to get fists flying. Bar stools, tables and benches add more tactical options to your fights.
The Pictish village is inspired by the Conan story "Beyond the Black River" depicting (ahem...) a confrontation between Conan and the savage Picts.
The pirate ship scenarios are inspired by Conan's days as a pirate, when he sailed with Bêlit, Queen of the Black Coast. Savage boardings, ruthless ship to ship combats and plunder are the order of the day!
The infamous fortress is where you will be under siege or, perhaps even more frightening, where you will have to face the terrible Thog, an ancient god linked to the nightmarish legend of Cthulhu. Coming soon...
The Barbarian of legend is the most powerful warrior in the Hyborian Age. As stretch goals are met, you will be able to choose between different versions of Conan, each with their own skills.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Arnaud Boudoiron
Shevatas, King of thieves, makes a mockery of even the most complex locks; his feline agility allows him to evade the grasp of his foes without breaking step.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Stéphane Simon
As one of the few sorcerors that Conan trusts, Hadrathus' arcane power provides invaluable assistance to the group. His mystical shield makes him very resiliant, he can also magically shift from one place to another, and cause his enemies to burst into flames.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Arnaud Boudoiron
Queen of the Black Coast and captain of the infamous pirate ship Tigress, Bêlit is a charismatic leader who knows how to drive her crew (or any adventurer, such as her faithful warrior N'Gora) to victory.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Yannick Hennebo
Bêlit's right-hand man N'Gora is a seasoned fighter, able to take the fight to the enemy (in close combat or at a distance); he is also very good at defending and protecting his allies.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Stéphane Simon
She may appear frail and weak but don't let this fool you. Zelata the witch uses her arsenal of magical potions as well as her giant lupine bodyguard to deadly effect!
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Grégory Clavilier and Elfried Perochon
Conan's trusted companion, Valeria is a swordswoman without equal. While lacking Conan's raw power, she more than makes up for it in precision and efficiency!
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Yannick Hennebo
The character sheets allow you to keep track of your heroes' most important resource: their stamina gems, as well as their abilities, strengths and weaknesses.
For each action attempted, you roll an amount of dice equal to the sum of the stamina gems you have invested in the action, plus any bonuses. Each character rolls a certain color of dice for different types of actions. There are 3 types of dice: Yellow is the weakest, you have less of a chance to hit and will obtain fewer successes. Red is the strongest dice whereas Orange is in between.
Three kinds of engraved dice
Each Hero begins an adventure with a certain amount of equipment cards: Weapons, Shields, Armour, Potions... This equipment gives you bonuses to your rolls or allows you to execute certain special actions. A weapon for example, will allow you to roll additional dice during an attack. A sorcerer hero will use Spell cards that give him special abilities, such as teleportation.
The majority of the players will control Conan and the other heroes, the player pitted against them is known as the Overlord. This player controls not one but multiple groups of models, both mindless henchmen, powerful villains and terrible monsters. The book of Skelos allows him to keep track of all these models as well as his own stamina gems and activation track.
The Book of Skelos
A classical evil-doer, The Necromancer can revive and control the dead. He may seem frail but beware his nefarious aura, it has been the end of many an adventurer who has come too close and gazed into the eyes of death.
Illustration by Adrian Smith, sculpted by Stéphane Simon

Conan has been heavily tested, with over 500 people having participated in the playtesting. The rules were finalised at the last possible moment so as to incorporate as many suggestions and fine tunings as possible. Nevertheless, please note that this is still an Alpha version of the rules and may be subject to change.
Apart from being huge fans of Conan and Robert E. Howard, we have been working in the gaming industry for many years now. Frédéric Henry is the author behind some incredibly successful games such as The Adventurers, Timeline and The Builders. Erwan and Loïg Hascoët are the founders of Bombyx, a respected publishing company with many great games in their catalogue such as Takenoko, The Builders and Abyss. Monolith was created so that we could make the game of our dreams: Conan. HeroQuest was a big part of our gaming culture as kids and we wanted to recreate the joy and immersion we felt for that game back then. So as to stay as true to Robert E. Howard as possible, we hired Patrice Louinet as a consultant, a world renowned expert on this author's works. This gives us a degree of authenticity that is almost unheard of in a product like this. Patrice has approved all the contents of the Barbarian and King box sets as well as most of the stretch goals. Please note that some KS exclusive add-ons to the game will take inspiration from a few non-canon areas which were only mentioned by Robert E. Howard but not fully developed. Patrice was not consulted about those and thus they don't have his approval seal. This being said, we have always kept the spirit of Howard's work in mind and worked under the strict supervision of Paradox Entertainment, owners of the Conan property.
On top of the people from Monolith, a huge team of passionate professionals have worked on Conan. Here’s a complete list:

Conan has had a lot more money invested in it than the majority of board games. If we were to apply the margins of a classic development cycle, the cost of the box set and the stretch goals would be far too high, around $250. The process of desintermediation that is inherant to Kickstarter allows us to reduce this price down to something far more manageable and in line with other large board games. It also allows us to take the product directly to our target audience.
Shipping costs will be applied once the Kickstarter is over so as to allow us to calculate the exact costs when taking into account all the unlocked stretch goals and optional purchases. We have reached an agreement with Asmodee for deliveries in North America and Philibert for Europe.
Since the project began, we have unlocked a phenomenal amount of Stretch Goals which do of course have an effect on the price of shipping.

For all other parts of the world, it is a lot harder for us to get a precise estimation as we do not have logistical hubs there. campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This isn't our first rodeo. We have been producing games and working with factories in China for some time now. We are familiar with the delays that can unexpectedly pop up, whether they be due to production, shipping or customs.
The estimated delivery date for Conan is October 2015, but please keep in mind that this is an informed guess. Also note that due to logistical restrictions in different regions, some backers may receive their pledge rewards before others. We will be doing our utmost to avoid these situations and, in the unlikely event that we are unable to deliver the game, we will be refunding pledges in full. Due to the fact that Conan is 80% complete as we head into this campaign, and that we have already signed agreements with many of those in charge of production, delivery and distribution, we have no reason to suspect that this eventuality will ever occur.

Refund policy

All pledges can be refunded up to 60 days after the end of the Kickstarter campaign, charges included, no questions asked. After which, we will be unable to refund you the charges incurred by Kickstarter and Amazon (as we will not be refunded by them after this 60 day period). Once we have started to process and pack your order however (generally 4 to 6 weeks before the estimated delivery date), refunds will no longer be available. If any part of an order cannot be delivered, then we will reimburse you the cost of this component, charges included.
Any refunds requested during the original 60 day period can be sent via your credit card or Amazon payments account. Those requested after however will be via PayPal only.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
